newsitem.title: USA: U.S. chain store sales up 0.4 pct--BTM/Schroders.
newsitem.headline: U.S. chain store sales up 0.4 pct--BTM/Schroders.

text.p: U.S. chain store sales rose by 0.4 percent in the week ended July 26 from the prior week, according to the seasonally adjusted BTM/Schroders weekly chain store sales index.
Sales for the week were up 3.7 percent on a year-over-year basis, while the month-to-date index advanced 0.6 percent from the prior month.
"Sales were generally above plan for the week with hot weather seasonal merchandise ... such as air conditioners and fans again cited as selling well," the report said.
